# Gears of War 4 XP

![XP graph](https://github.com/TheanosLearning/Gears4XpLevels/raw/master/images/ReUpFits-Full.png)

Notes:

* `For each ReUp, the amount of XP needed to level up grows quadratically (non linear). Because of this, level 70 (& not 50) is the approximate XP halfway point for all ReUps (& Wings)`<sup>1</sup>

<a id="table-top"></a>

[![Jump to Bottom](https://github.com/TheanosLearning/Gears4XpLevels/raw/master/images/arrow_sans_down_32.png)](#table-bottom)

---
<sup>1</sup>
At level 50 you are &frac14; through the ReUp (in terms of XP) and at level 85 you are &frac34;.
As a quick heuristic, you will reach *p* percent of your ReUp at level *L = &radic;p*
